action.name: Abrir Terminal Aqui
action.command: for f in %F; do if [ -d "$f" ]; then exo-open --working-directory "$f" --launch TerminalEmulator; elif [ -z "$default" ]; then default=1; exo-open --launch TerminalEmulator; fi done

action.name: Abrir Root Terminal Aqui
action.command: pkexec env DISPLAY=$DISPLAY XAUTHORITY=$XAUTHORITY dbus-launch lxterminal --default-working-directory=%f
